context.title: Changelog for Rule: `video` element visual-only content has description track
context.changelog: [{"commit":"4e85f969664aa3439075967c481db6bfc1ea86c6","msg":"Updating rule name(s) and filename(s) (#943)","date":"1569413997"},{"commit":"b233c3d2f67ebe5d52a0ad2738e61c733ae32c8c","msg":"test: spell check rules markdown body (#867)","date":"1569313606"},{"commit":"fef49b730189c2ab6860fbcaa36641016d11e328","msg":"Make all test asset paths root relative (#887)","date":"1568700536"},{"commit":"3c081053825819f44ecec129e4d835b16c71db4d","msg":"Add many missing links to glossary (#695)","date":"1567495802"},{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"71af6a0dfa82898888bcba743e9d1c700bdf92b8","msg":"Editorial changes (#725)","date":"1566371604"},{"commit":"12d14a9acaa5c5e403fe96f7ec14a8b12a3d2b13","msg":"fix: test if definition for  all referenced glossary terms exist (#634)","date":"1563353169"},{"commit":"eaaf3b64c21d5ec1c665a8800710b35d88df073a","msg":"Template update - Video only element has description track (#539)","date":"1557262298"},{"commit":"e71f9fbbf9de177da8f99179bcc76402c2188abf","msg":"1.2.1 audio only and video only  (#276)","date":"1547037237"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ac7dc6","name":"`video` element visual-only content has description track","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming `video` elements, without audio, are descriptive.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
